Independent t-test for charges between yes and no: t=4.8866, p-value=0.0001. Mean(yes)=30285.72+/-10256.98, Mean(no)=7994.10+/-7672.62. REJECT null hypothesis. Means are SIGNIFICANTLY DIFFERENT at alpha=0.05. Effect size (Cohen's d)=2.7317.

Independent t-test for charges between female and male: t=0.5609, p-value=0.5818. Mean(female)=14347.94+/-9431.65, Mean(male)=11188.74+/-13876.69. FAIL TO REJECT null hypothesis. Means are NOT SIGNIFICANTLY DIFFERENT at alpha=0.05. Effect size (Cohen's d)=0.2560.

Independent t-test for bmi between yes and no: t=0.8873, p-value=0.3866. Mean(yes)=32.91+/-7.29, Mean(no)=30.06+/-5.38. FAIL TO REJECT null hypothesis. Means are NOT SIGNIFICANTLY DIFFERENT at alpha=0.05. Effect size (Cohen's d)=0.4960.
